section.title: Description
section.p: This Symbian C++ code example demonstrates how to easily use the onboard camera with zoom and autofocus, utilising an accompanying CameraWrapper made by the example. The example application supports the use of both the keypad and touch UI. The application can be self-signed, but it also provides an option to use the dedicated camera key (Symbian signing required).

section.title: Download
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: CameraExample.zip file
Click: browse to view the example code.
